content: आच्छद् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To cover (in general); नाच्छादयति कौपीनं <ls>Pt. 3. 97.</ls> {@--2@} To hide; भानोराच्छादयत्प्रभां <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To clothe, dress, put on clothes; <ls>Ms. 3. 27</ls>; अनेन वाससाच्छन्नः <ls>Mb.</ls>; वस्त्रं, प्रावारान् &c. आच्छादयति &c.
आच्छद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} A cover, covering. {@--2@} A sheath; °विधानं an arrangement made for defence, a means for covering.
